newsitem.title: USA: Kmart Corp Q1 net profit versus loss.
newsitem.headline: Kmart Corp Q1 net profit versus loss.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)
NOTE: '97 Q1 profit from continuing operations $14 million, or $0.03 a share, versus loss of $36 million, or $0.08 a share.

'96 Q1 net loss of $99 million, or $0.21 a share, includes discontinued operations charges of $63 million, or $0.13 a share, related to Kmart's investments in Thrifty PayLess Holdings Inc and Builders Square.
